ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cphnmvs.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | cphnmvs.n | |- N = ( norm ` W ) |
| 3 |  | cphnmvs.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 4 |  | cphnmvs.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 5 |  | cphnmvs.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cphnlm | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. NrmMod ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( norm ` F ) = ( norm ` F ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7 | #P_nmvs | |- ( ( W e. NrmMod /\ X e. K /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( ( ( norm ` F ) ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. K /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( ( ( norm ` F ) ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_cphclm | |- ( W e. CPreHil -> W e. CMod ) |
| 11 | 4, 5 | #P_clmabs | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ X e. K ) -> ( abs ` X ) = ( ( norm ` F ) ` X ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. K ) -> ( abs ` X ) = ( ( norm ` F ) ` X ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. K /\ Y e. V ) -> ( abs ` X ) = ( ( norm ` F ) ` X ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. K /\ Y e. V ) -> ( ( abs ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) = ( ( ( norm ` F ) ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ X e. K /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` ( X .x. Y ) ) = ( ( abs ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) |
